title: News API Frontend
body: Today at 9:00PM CST the frontend news API was finished for the Insolesia CentraGov Website.

title: Website Desktop & Mobile Friendly!
body: The website is now fully optimized for most devices! Thank you for your patience.

title: News Page Update.
body: The news page now shows the past 3 news messages at once. Now, if you missed one, you have time to go back and take a look!
